meanings.def: an officer of middle rank in the police force
examples: He reached the rank of inspector.

meanings.def: a person whose job is to visit schools, factories, etc. to check that rules are being obeyed and that standards are acceptable
examples: An inspector was sent to the scene of the incident.
He agreed to allow weapons inspectors in his country.
The school inspectors were called in.
the inspector in charge of producing the report
The health and safety inspector wrote a worrying report on the building.

meanings.def: (in the UK) a person whose job is to check tickets on a bus or train
